body_html: You might be able to get away with renaming that to '/device:GPU:0' -- I can try this today too and see what breaks. We've been trying to make sure we canonicalize the device name to the 'new style names' whenever needed, but it's possible there are some places that aren't fixed.
body_text: You might be able to get away with renaming that to '/device:GPU:0' -- I can try this today too and see what breaks.  We've been trying to make sure we canonicalize the device name to the 'new style names' whenever needed, but it's possible there are some places that aren't fixed.
body: You might be able to get away with renaming that to '/device:GPU:0' -- I can try this today too and see what breaks.  We've been trying to make sure we canonicalize the device name to the 'new style names' whenever needed, but it's possible there are some places that aren't fixed.
